        public ResponseEnum createClientUser(ClientUser clientUser,
                                     java.lang.String passwordRepeat)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        This method save the user data in the database and send an email to confirm the registration.
        Parameters:
        model - A Model from spring boot used to storage the responseMessage
        clientUser - A Model from spring boot which has the user data.
        passwordRepeat - A second password in string format that is used to check if both passwords are the same.
        Returns:
        a responseMessage in String format with the status information.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        email - The clientUser email email in string format that is used to check the validation .
        clienUser - A user in ClientUser format that storages the password submitted.
        psw-repeat - A second password repeated to check if both passwords are equals.
